definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
(personal) warmth/approachability/accessibility/(in a product) user friendliness/(chemistry) affinity

sentences.english: Here I have gathered some logos inspired by the Eco Friendly concept.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，我已經收集了一些標誌啓發生態親和概念。

sentences.english: Fans loved Duff's clean cut, teen-friendly image.
sentences.chinese: 歌迷們喜歡達芙清新健康的親和形象。

sentences.english: Results showed that vegetative compatibility was prevailing among isolates of M grisea in Jiangsu province in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 表明營養體親和在江蘇省稻瘟病菌中發生較爲普遍。

sentences.english: Kupchan wonders how long the congeniality can last.
sentences.chinese: 庫普坎懷疑這種親和可以持續多久。

sentences.english: Such microspheres can be applied in the immunoaffinity adsorption and separation of clenbuterol antibodies.
sentences.chinese: 將這種微球免疫親和吸附分離鹽酸克倫特羅的抗體。

sentences.english: Your boyfriend is a great guy, really nice.
sentences.chinese: 你的男朋友是個不錯的人，特別親和。

sentences.english: And the pro - Ma Shasha also answer will be warm - hearted person to carry forward the spirit of the network.
sentences.chinese: 親和的馬莎莎也有問必答，將熱心腸精神發揚至網絡。

sentences.english: Incarvillea lutea is self-compatible, but depends on insects for seed production.
sentences.chinese: 黃波羅花自交親和，但必須依賴昆蟲傳粉產生種子。

sentences.english: This same form is the basis on which Buddhism and aesthetics set the affinity.
sentences.chinese: 這項共相是佛學和美學建立親和關係的學理基礎。

sentences.english: Cross-fertilization will be more likely in self-compatible species.
sentences.chinese: 在自交親和的植株上很可能發生異花受精。
